title: Clinique Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel 50ml
description: What It Is: 8-hour oil-free hydration that  naturally perfects and unifies skin tone. What It Does: BB-gel with Transforming Tint Release Technology™ delivers 8-hour oil-free hydration and a sheer wash of color that first appears as a grey hue, then transforms to naturally perfect and unify skin tone.
ai_title: Clinique Dramatically Different™ BB-Gel - 50ml - Oil-Free Hydration & Color Correction
ai_summary:
Experience 8-hour oil-free hydration with Clinique Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel, a unique formula that perfects and unifies your skin tone for a naturally flawless look. This lightweight BB-gel is ideal for busy women seeking a simple, multi-tasking skincare solution.
  • Transforming Tint Release Technology™ delivers a sheer wash of color that adapts to your natural skin tone.
  • Oil-free formula provides lightweight hydration without clogging pores.
  • Camouflage print on the bottle helps you find the right shade for your skin tone.
  • Can be applied like a moisturizer, for a natural and seamless finish.
  • Suitable for all skin types, leaving skin feeling smooth and refreshed.
